resources.string: To wake up Nasduq, \n you need to type your password.

This is a sample app to showcase Cognito Identity and the SDK for Android.

Because Nasduq`s in beta phase, 
it can only accept a limited number of people. 
That`s why we are only giving away 100 passwords... for now. 
 
 
 
Enter your e-mail to request a code, 
you might be one of the lucky few.
We received your e-mail! \nExpect further instructions in the next 24 hours.
Sorry, we could not complete the request due to an unknown error. Try again later.
